relatedNodes.html: Receive details on the security guard licencing process
Get started today and receive your Training Completion Number (TCN) within 24 Hrs of Course Completion:
Online Security Guard Course & Emergency First Aid and CPR Level C and AED*
THEY RECEIVED THEIR SECURITY LICENCE
FEEDBACK FROM THOSE ENROLLED
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Wondering what it is like working as a security guard and the benefits of becoming one?

Create an account to access the free lesson and sample quiz

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(12) > form > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > h5:nth-child(2)
html > body > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > h5:nth-child(2)
html > body > section:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(4) > h4:nth-child(3)
html > body > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > h3:nth-child(5)
html > body > section:nth-child(5) > div > p:nth-child(2) > iframe

any.message: Heading order valid
